name: Air-Tight
description:
The game is about a deserted planet without oxygen, with the help of your pack animal you will have to cross it without running out of resources or air.

If you can't manage to start the animal try pumping O2 manually several times.

This game is a prototype and can have bugs or present high difficulty for non experienced players.

This game is best played with a PS4 controller.

Keyboard is an option:

AD to move

Q interact

E action

SPACE jump

R eat

T inspect

Z recipes

H next recipe

ESC menu
